variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Randomly-generated 6-digit ID code preceded by CHOP ID code (95)
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: 16=Marshfield Clinic; 27=Vanderbilt University; 38=Group Health Cooperative; 49=Mayo Clinic; 52=Northwestern University; 63=Geisinger; 74=Mt. Sinai; 95=CHOP 6-digit random integer appended to the 2-digit site identifier.

variable.name: ORIGIN_ID
variable.description: ID of eMERGE Consortium Site

variable.name: Year_of_Birth
variable.description: Year of birth

variable.name: Sex_Genotype
variable.description: Gender of participant as defined by genotype

variable.name: Sex_Med
variable.description: Gender of participant as identified by medical records

variable.name: Sex_Survey
variable.description: Gender of participant as identified by survey of patient/patient's parent

variable.name: Race_Med
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant as identified by medical records
variable.comment: AA=Black or African American; AI=American Indian or Alaska Native; AS=Asian; EA=European American; HI=Hispanic/Latino; PI=Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander; OT=Other; NA=Not Available/Missing Dataset enriched for European and African American samples.

variable.name: Race_Survey
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant as identified by patient/patient's parent
variable.comment: AA=Black or African American; AI=American Indian or Alaska Native; AS=Asian; EA=European American; HI=Hispanic/Latino; PI=Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander; OT=Other; NA=Not Available/Missing Dataset enriched for European and African American samples.

variable.name: Affection_Status
variable.description: Indicates whether participant is a case or control

variable.name: Chip_Type
variable.description: Array on which participants were genotyped
variable.comment: QUAD=Illumina Human610; Quadv1 V1=Illumina HumanHap550v1; V2=Illumina HumanHap550v2; V3=Illumina HumanHap550v3

variable.name: Endocrine_and_Metabolic_Drugs
variable.description: Endocrine and metabolic drugs that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Anti_Infective_Agents
variable.description: Anti-infective agents that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Respiratory_Agents
variable.description: Respiratory agents that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Analgesics_and_Anesthetics
variable.description: Analgesics and anesthetics that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Neuromuscular_Drugs
variable.description: Neuromuscular drugs that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Nutritional_Products
variable.description: Nutritional products that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Topical_Products
variable.description: Topical products that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Miscellaneous_Products
variable.description: Miscellaneous products that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Gastrointestinal_Agents
variable.description: Gastrointestinal agents that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Central_Nervous_System_Drugs
variable.description: Central nervous system drugs that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Hematological_Agents
variable.description: Hematological agents that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Cardiovascular_Agents
variable.description: Cardiovascular agents that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Genitourinary_Products
variable.description: Genitourinary products that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Antineoplastic_Agents
variable.description: Anti-neoplastic agents that have been prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Biological
variable.description: Other biological agents/drugs prescribed to the patient

variable.name: Primary_Diagnoses
variable.description: Primary diagnosis as defined by ICD9 code(s)
variable.comment: The list of ICD9 codes/definitions is too large to include in the data dictionary and can be reviewed at: http://icd9.chrisendres.com/
